metadata.Title: CVE-2020-8162 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.Description: A client side enforcement of server side security vulnerability exists in rails < 5.2.4.2 and rails < 6.0.3.1 ActiveStorage's S3 adapter that allows the Content-Length of a direct file upload to be modified by an end user bypassing upload limits.

notes.Note: seth-arnold> In Oneiric-Saucy, rails package is just for transition; The rails package contains actual code from vivid onward

criterions.comment: rails package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2:5.2.4.3+dfsg-2').
